TestCase.name: testAggregateWithAlias
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[AS($0, _UTF-16LE'b')], x=[AS($1.f0, _UTF-16LE'x')], y=[AS($1.f1, _UTF-16LE'y')]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], TMP_0=[CountMinMax($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, TMP_0.f0 AS x, TMP_0.f1 AS y]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, CountMinMax(a) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggregateWithScalarResult
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$0], TMP_0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], TMP_0=[COUNT($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(a) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testDistinctAggregateOnTumbleWindow
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1]) +- LogicalWindowAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($0)], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 900000)], properties=[]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

GroupWindowAggregate(window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 900000)], select=[COUNT(DISTINCT a) AS EXPR$0, SUM(a) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testDistinctAggregateWithGroupingOnSessionWindow
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalWindowAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], window=[SessionGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 900000)], properties=[]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

GroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[a], window=[SessionGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 900000)], select=[a, COUNT(a) AS EXPR$0, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(a) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithAverage
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$0], EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[AVG($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], a0=[CAST($0):DOUBLE]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, AVG(a0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c, CAST(a) AS a0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithConstant1
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(four=[$1], EXPR$0=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], four=[4], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[4 AS four, EXPR$0]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, four], select=[a, four, SUM(b) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, four]]) +- Calc(select=[a, 4 AS four, b]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithConstant2
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(four=[$1], EXPR$0=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], four=[4], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[4 AS four, EXPR$0]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, four], select=[b, four, SUM(a) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, four]]) +- Calc(select=[b, 4 AS four, a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSimpleAggregate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[AS($0, _UTF-16LE'b')], f0=[AS($1.f0, _UTF-16LE'f0')], f1=[AS($1.f1, _UTF-16LE'f1')]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], TMP_0=[CountMinMax($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, TMP_0.f0 AS f0, TMP_0.f1 AS f1]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, CountMinMax(a) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithExpressionInSelect
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[MIN($2)], EXPR$1=[AVG($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[MOD($1, 3)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, MIN(c) AS EXPR$0, AVG(a) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[a, MOD(b, 3) AS d, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$0], EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[CAST(2) AS b, EXPR$0]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(a) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[=(b, 2)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupDistinctAggregateWithUDAGG
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{2}], EXPR$0=[WeightedAvg(DISTINCT $0, $1)], EXPR$1=[WeightedAvg($0, $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, WeightedAvg(DISTINCT a, b) AS EXPR$0, WeightedAvg(a, b) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupDistinctAggregate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[SUM(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(DISTINCT a) AS EXPR$0, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDistinctAggregateSameFieldOnHopWindow
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], EXPR$2=[$2]) +- LogicalWindowAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$2=[MAX(DISTINCT $0)], window=[SlidingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 3600000, 900000)], properties=[]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

GroupWindowAggregate(window=[SlidingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 3600000, 900000)], select=[COUNT(DISTINCT a) AS EXPR$0, SUM(DISTINCT a) AS EXPR$1, MAX(DISTINCT a) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testSelectStar
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[AS($0, _UTF-16LE'b')], f0=[AS($1.f0, _UTF-16LE'f0')], f1=[AS($1.f1, _UTF-16LE'f1')], f2=[AS($1.f2, _UTF-16LE'f2')]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], TMP_0=[CountMinMax($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, TMP_0.f0 AS f0, TMP_0.f1 AS f1, TMP_0.f2 AS f2]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, CountMinMax(a) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
